description:
***OVER 1000 Students enrolled in the first 48 hours***

If you're ready to learn how to create and claim the best sleep you've ever had, this class is for you. The power of hypnosis, guided meditation, and personal instruction will make restless nights and tired mornings a thing of the past.

Seven Days to Blissful Sleep is organized into seven sections, or days. Each “day” can represent a 24 hour period or can be stretched out over the course of weeks depending on personal preference. This class, this healing journey, is meant to be completed at the pace that feels right to you and is available 24 hours a day/7 days a week after enrolling.

Each day there is a short video to watch which offers insight and instruction. There is an audio hypnosis recording paired with each video to listen to at night. Each recording incorporates hypnosis and visualizations in order to bring about the desired positive changes.

Seven Days to Blissful Sleep is a wonderful journey. This journey will guide you in reclaiming your personal power and ability to enjoy the nighttime hours and to awake feeling refreshed and full of new life.

I invite you to enroll today and begin your journey toward claiming deep, healing, and blissful sleep each night. With my 30 Day Money Back Guarantee, you have nothing to lose...except, of course, more precious nights of sleep!
title: Seven Days to Blissful Sleep
